actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the price of natural gas should not be permitted to be increased prior to January 1974, in certain cases.

summary.text: Declares it to be the sense of the Congress that it will be contrary to the public interest for the Federal Power Commission to permit increases in the price of natural gas above the administratively determined area rate ceilings in effect on June 1, 1973. Provides that the Commission may prior to January 1, 1974 consider and approve petitions for special relief from said rates in instances where, based on an evidentiary record, the Commission finds such relief to be cost justified.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the price of natural gas should not be permitted to be increased prior to January 1974, in certain cases.
